page.title: 02EDUCATION
page.content: STRATHMARTINE PRIMARY SCHOOL THE SCHOOL ROLL DURING THE SESSION 1984-85 IS 30, 16 GIRLS AND 14 BOYS. MRS BLACK, THE HEAD TEACHER TOOK UP HER APPOINTMENT AT THE END OF FEBRUARY 1985 AND TEACHES IN ROOM 1 WITH PRIMARY 1-4.SHE HAS 15 CHILDREN MRS HOW THE ASSISTANT TEACHER HAS PRIMARY 5,6,7 IN ROOM 2. PRIMARY 1 HAS 2 PUPILS 2 GIRLS PRIMARY 2 HAS 5 PUPILS 2 GIRLS 3 BOYS PRIMARY 3 HAS 5 PUPILS 2 GIRLS 3 BOYS PRIMARY 4 HAS 3 PUPILS 2 GIRLS 1 BOY PRIMARY 5 HAS 4 PUPILS 2 GIRLS 2 BOYS PRIMARY 6 HAS 4 PUPILS 3 GIRLS 1 BOY PRIMARY 7 HAS 7 PUPILS 3 GIRLS 4 BOYS AT PRESENT 2 ROOMS ARE USED FOR DAILY TEACHING AND THE OTHER CLASSROOM 3 IS USED AS A GENERAL PURPOSE ROOM.THE PUPILS USE THIS FOR ART AND CRAFTWORK,FABRIC CRAFT, MUSIC,LIBRARY AND A GENERAL INFORMATION ROOM.
